Game: Girls Only Girls Only is a game designed for girls between the ages of nine and twelve that encourages them to use their imagination and create the latest fashion designs, add a decorative touch and splash of color to their chosen room, manage their own ice-cream parlor and nurture and care for their own pets. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/21e50899-cf28-4bb6-b6ee-f6dfb1dda744.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/41bcf87d-8baa-4f0a-94b9-eb76a1f04e8a.jpg
